Sock-bot: A smart sock that connects to your phone and sends you notifications about your socks, such as when they need to be washed or replaced.
Sock-a-Palooza: A subscription service that sends you a new pair of socks every month.
Sock-a-Pedia: An app that helps you find information about socks, such as their size, material, and brand.
Sock-a-Cycle: A recycling program that takes old socks and turns them into new ones.
Sock-a-Scraper: A tool that removes dirt and debris from the bottom of your socks.
